permissions.description:
As this is intended to be a Tenant-permissions record, it should start at /db/pekoe/tenants/*
It might be best to generate this from an existing tenant. Like BKFA. Then apply it to another like TDBG.
Examples of specific permissions: /db/pekoe/tenants/tdbg/config/new-job.xql

collection.p: Note that the permissions here are r-xr-x--- with SetUID on owner
